summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, referencing a Washington Post article about jail staffing shortages at the Metropolitan Correctional Center where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The email suggests asking the Warden about the issue, indicating concerns about conditions prior to Epstein's death.

keyFacts: The email references a Washington Post article from August 11, 2019, about staffing issues at the jail where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
Officers watching Epstein were reportedly on overtime due to staffing shortages at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The email suggests asking the Warden about the staffing issue, indicating internal concern about jail conditions.
This correspondence occurred just days before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, highlighting pre-existing concerns about jail security.
